title.rendered: Spring 2021 Virtual Fair Office Hours—Join Us!

content.rendered:
Do you and your team have questions about the best way to host a virtual fair on Handshake? You’re not alone—and we’re here to help.

From January 14th to March 18th, join us on Thursdays at 11am PT/2pm ET to ask your questions about how to host a virtual career fair in Handshake—while you’re at it, learn from your peers about how they are strategizing their fairs this semester.

Click here to join

You can review our slide presentation here!

excerpt.rendered: Join us for weekly office hours to ask questions and learn new virtual fair strategies.
